Fair E-Books

an e-book store build with React, Redux, Express and MongoDB

Demo

the demo is hosted on an AWS EC2 instance

Features

  • product search

  • shopping cart system

  • user secure authentication

  • customized product page with rate and review

  • product pagination

  • paypal api integration

  • inventory management system

  • best selling product jumbotron

Explore More at Github
